translation: Fengjing Peiye Youmen Yixin chanshi Pinghu Shen's son.
He showed the crowd.
"In the past, there was an owner of a monastery.
On the door, he wrote the word 'mind'.
On the window, he wrote the character Ṛshin.
On the wall, he wrote the character Ṛshin.
Later, the Dharma eye said.
'On the door, you don't need to write the word door.
On the door, you don't need to write the word 'door,' and on the breast, you don't need to write the word 'breast.'
On the wall, you don't write the word wall.
Why is that?
The meaning of the words is clear.
The teacher said.
'Whether it's written or not, it's always a ghost clinging to grass and wood.'
They're always ghosts clinging to wood and grass.
This is the almsgiver's meal.
How could it come from your three mouths?
You'll have to stick to your family and state.
He snapped his fingers and said.
"Hey!" (Retired Weng Caiji).

source_sentence: 天台通玄翼菴酇禪師溫州永嘉葉氏子。
translation: Tendai Tongxuan Yi'an Qianshan Chanshi Wenzhou Yongjia Ye's son.
He went up to the hall.
"At the peak of Tongxuan's peak.
The wind and clouds don't follow each other.
It's not the human realm.
The sun and moon have constancy.
There's nothing outside the mind.
From this, he forces himself into outer space.
He's looking at a mountain full of green hills.

source_sentence: 覓甚纖毫過患　上堂。
translation: Looking for even the slightest hint of trouble, he ascended the hall.
The fragrant mists of Xiang Luo Feng permeate the sky.
The ringing of the drum cave's perfect voice is heard everywhere.
Those who have eyes like blindness ...
Those who have ears like the deaf have arrived.
How can I create a way for you to understand?
He then picked up his staff.
He pulled it up and said.
"Inside the thousand-year-old peach kernel.
Originally, it was an old kernel." The junior monk said.
"Put your hand out and hit it in the hand.
He beat it with his mouth.
A monk came out and said.
"What happened when you were pure and naked?
The teacher then beat him.
He said, "I'm here, I say.
The master then hit him again and said.
"That's a man who bites off a lump of dung!" (Retired Weng Chuji).

source_sentence: 崇川東山善持馭禪師邑之朱氏子。
translation: Seungcheon Dongshan Shanzhi Rak Seonji Eup's son Zhu.
He went up to the hall.
He raised his whisk and said.
"The Bodhidharma has come.
His eyes are fixed and moving.
There are white clouds for a million miles.
If you ask about the people who came from the west.
A little while later, he examined them in front of the abstinence hall.
Throwing his whisk, he dismounted from his seat and went up to the hall.
He took the staff and said.
"Shenji is alone in his sharpness.
It's honored by the people of the future.
The marvelous function of sound, generosity, and release is all dependent on swiftness.
It all depends on swiftness.
If he didn't have the means to raise the dead and return to life.
U could always hold the Dharma reins.
It's easier for a man to simply defecate.
Up to this point.
If he moves, misfortune will arise.
There's another family that's not willing.
They'll come out and try [jumping-zhao+ha].
After a long time, he looked around.
He looked around and said.
"This is a stone-and-fire flash that shows off his ability to discern.
How many others can there be?
He took the staff (Daion Taisi).

source_sentence: 天池大覺徵聖圖禪師崇川人。
translation: Tianchi Dajue Zheng Shengtu Chanshi A native of Chongchuan.
He made a small study.
"Everyone has nostrils.
He doesn't let Śākyamuni.
Each person's eyes are the same as Bodhidharma's.
They're all the same as Bodhidharma's.
The greatly enlightened one asks.
"All of you have nostrils and eyes.
Since they're the same as the Buddha and the ancestors, why did clouds arise on the southern mountain?
Why do clouds arise in the southern mountains and rain in the northern mountains?
Why is it raining on the northern mountain?
He gave a shout, saying.
'Where U's power doesn't reach, the hundred rivers will flow backwards.'
A hundred rivers should flow backwards (Daiō Taishi).

source_sentence: 蘇州南樹衷雪淵禪師崇明黃氏子。
translation: Huang's son, Chongming, a Seon master from Nanyueji, Suzhou.
He wrote a verse about the causes and conditions of the disaster in the hell cave, saying.
"The elder couldn't help the boat.
The Gautama broke the bailing bucket.
He sent word to this man.
"He's been going and coming with his mouth agonizingly open.
A verse on the case of the old mother in the eastern part of the city says.
"It's true that we'll die together and be born together.
Yet, they want to leave us and search for a different path.
"There's no way to escape from this enemy.

source_sentence: 眼前草木盡逢春(退翁儲嗣)。
translation: The grass and trees in front of us all spring up (Retired Weng Chuisi).
Wu Dengquan shu, vol. 86
